title: His True Fortune
description: The fourth and final installment of the bestselling His Every Whim series!With Samantha still spurning his love, Drake decides it might be time to move on. Little does he know, Samantha has a secret and its one she isn't ready to admit.As a federal takeover threatens Xander's company, he decides it is better to keep a very pregnant Ashley in the dark. What he doesn't realize is his increased demands and overprotective behavior have Ashley believing he's pulling away from her.With both couples unsure of their futures, will they finally have their happily ever afters?This 19,000 word novella is the anticipated ending of two love stories between plus sized sassy women and the billionaires who can't resist them.
author: Liliana Rhodes
